Name: Black Cherry Cocktail
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: Subtle berry fruit tames vodka's sting with vermouth adding depth and complexity. Simple but tasty.
Nutrition: One serving of Black Cherry Cocktail contains 262 calories
